alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 1:34PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT AREAS NEAR HAPPY JACK...MORMON LAKE AND STONEMAN LAKE IN COCONINO COUNTY THROUGH 215 PM MST... At 133 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tremaine Lake moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tremaine Lake, Happy Jack, Long Lake, and Chavez Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall may result in minor flooding of low-lying and poor drainage areas.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim
